snippet: Israeli aircraft bombed the Gaza Strip on Sunday after the latest in a series of Palestinian rocket attacks that Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu accused the international community of ignoring.
abstract: Israeli aircraft bomb Gaza Strip following Palestinian rocket attack, latest in series of incidents Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu has accused international community of ignoring.
lead_paragraph: Israeli aircraft bombed the Gaza Strip on Sunday after the latest in a series of Palestinian rocket attacks that Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu accused the international community of ignoring.
